Token.Abstract: The base class of view snapshotting tests. If you have small UI component, it's often easier to configure it in a test and compare an image of the view to a reference image that write lots of complex layout-code tests.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
When YES, the test macros will save reference images, rather than performing an actual test.
Performs the comparisons or records a snapshot of the view if recordMode is YES.

Parameter.Name: referenceImagesDirectory
Parameter.Abstract: The directory in which reference images are stored.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: An optional identifier, used if there are multiple snapshot tests in a given -test method.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error to log in an XCTAssert() macro if the method fails (missing reference image, images differ, etc).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the comparison (or saving of the reference image) succeeded.
